code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./RelatedProducts.css';import Item from'../Item/Item';import{backend_url}from'../../App';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RelatedProducts=_ref=>{let{category,id}=_ref;const[related,setRelated]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch("".concat(backend_url,"/relatedproducts"),{method:'POST',headers:{Accept:'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({category:category})}).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setRelated(data));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relatedproducts",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Related Products"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"relatedproducts-item",children:related.map((item,index)=>{if(id!==item.id){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Item,{id:item.id,name:item.name,image:item.image,new_price:item.new_price,old_price:item.old_price},index);}})})]});};export default RelatedProducts;
